column.name: htmlheader
column.value:
<style type="text/css">

html, body {
 background: @@@import:pagebackcol@@@; 			/* default background colour */
 margin: 0px;
 padding: 0px;
}

#header {
 background: @@@import:headerbackcol@@@;			/* header background colour */
 color: @@@import:headertextcol@@@;			/* header text colour */
 height: @@@import:headerheight@@@;				/* header height */
 display: block;
 z-index: 4;
}

#left {
 color: @@@import:lefttextcol@@@;			/* left column text colour */
 width: @@@import:leftwidth@@@;				/* left column width */
 margin-left: -@@@import:leftwidth@@@;			/* left column width */
 display: inline;
 float: left;
 position: relative;
 z-index: 3;
}

#center {
 background: @@@import:centerbackcol@@@;			/* center background colour */
 color: @@@import:centertextcol@@@;			/* center text colour */
 border-left-color: @@@import:leftbackcol@@@;		/* left column background colour */
 border-left-width: @@@import:leftwidth@@@;		/* left column width */
 border-right-color: @@@import:rightbackcol@@@;		/* right column background colour */
 border-right-width: @@@import:rightwidth@@@;		/* right column width */
 border-left-style: solid;
 border-right-style: solid;
 display: block;
 position: relative;
 overflow: visible;
}

#right {
 color: @@@import:righttextcol@@@;			/* right column text colour */
 width: @@@import:rightwidth@@@;				/* right column width */
 margin-right: -@@@import:rightwidth@@@;			/* right column width */
 display: inline;
 float: right;
 position: relative;
 z-index: 2;
}

#footer {
 background: @@@import:footerbackcol@@@;			/* footer background colour */
 color: @@@import:footertextcol@@@;			/* footer text colour */
 height: @@@import:footerheight@@@;				/* footer height */
 display: block;
}

.padding {
 height: 1px;
 clear: both;
 overflow: hidden;
}

#pagewidth {
 width: @@@import:pagewidth@@@;				/* page width */
 margin: auto;
}

#contentwidth {
 width: @@@import:contentwidth@@@;				/* content width */
 margin: auto;
}

</style>

<!--[if IE]>
<style type="text/css">

#center {
 display: inline-block;
}

#left {
 width: @@@import:leftwidth@@@;				/* left column width */
}

</style>
<![endif]-->

column.name: content
column.value:
@@@logo.content@@@ @@@banner.content@@@
@@@menu.content@@@
@@@news.content@@@

@@@title@@@

@@@content@@@
@@@toolbar.content@@@
